short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides the status check on all Azure resources and informs you to act quickly during any service issues and outage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this Azure Status Check extension, all Azure Cloud technical users and subscription owners can achieve your organization's reliability goals for all workloads by leveraging the resilient foundation of the cloud platform and ensuring that you are always informed and able to act quickly during any service issues and outages. After installing this Chrome Extension, all users can visually see the services status in green icon, when all services are up and running. If in case, any Azure Cloud service reports an outage, user will see the red icon with the count of services down due to specific outage. 
Secondly this Azure Status Check Chrome extension, will provide the popup screen and displays 
the geographical and region wise services availability with green or red checkmark with easy accessibility for all users running Azure Services.
